name: Stock Requisition Order
description: Order message for requesting stock items from inventory systems including medical supplies and pharmaceuticals
businessPurpose: Request stock items from central supply, pharmacy, or other inventory systems for patient care or department operations
timing: Sent when departments need to requisition stock items from inventory management systems
realWorldScenarios: Operating room requesting sterile surgical instruments for scheduled procedures
Emergency department ordering IV fluids and emergency medications
ICU requisitioning specialized monitoring equipment and supplies
Pharmacy requesting bulk medication restocking from central warehouse
Laboratory ordering reagents and test supplies for diagnostic equipment
Patient care unit requesting standard medical supplies and consumables

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - accurate requisitions critical for inventory management and patient care delivery
